title: wtb: t206 hof action poses...around G

posts.post_title: wtb: t206 hof action poses...around G
posts.post_content:
**revision 11/10/09**

i base prices/snipes on vcp but will go up/down depending on overall presentation of card.  i've been picking individual cards every week on ebay.  

still need:
johnson pitching
matty white cap
[STRIKE]kelley[/STRIKE]
[STRIKE]mcginnity[/STRIKE]
crawford throwing
[STRIKE]duffy[/STRIKE]
[STRIKE]tinker on knees[/STRIKE]
[STRIKE]speaker[/STRIKE]
cobb bat on
[STRIKE]wheat[/STRIKE]
[STRIKE]marquard follow through[/STRIKE]
[STRIKE]waddell throwing[/STRIKE]

bizzump for revision to list.

important:  if you're going to contact me to sell card(s) i need, please have the intention of selling.  i don't want to have to talk you into it and convince you...(i can spend that time looking through ebay scans at the other 10 examples of the same card).  thanks!
